name: libfranka
initializeCommand:
bash -c 'ENV_FILE=".devcontainer/.env"; if [ ! -f "$ENV_FILE" ]; then echo -e "UBUNTU_VERSION=20.04
UBUNTU_CODENAME=focal
USER_UID=$(id -u)
USER_GID=$(id -g)" > "$ENV_FILE"; else sed -i.bak "s/^USER_UID=.*/USER_UID=$(id -u)/" "$ENV_FILE"; sed -i.bak "s/^USER_GID=.*/USER_GID=$(id -g)/" "$ENV_FILE"; rm -f "$ENV_FILE.bak"; fi'
